name: bytestash
description: ByteStash is a self-hosted personal data warehouse designed to store notes, documents, or files in an organized searchable format. It offers a clean web interface and API access, ideal for centralizing personal data in a private cloud.
features: Data Warehouse: Personal storage for notes, documents, and files. Centralized organization.
Searchable Format: Powerful search across all stored content. Find anything instantly.
Clean Interface: Intuitive web UI for easy navigation. Beautiful design.
API Access: Programmatic access for automation and integrations. Developer-friendly.
Private Cloud: Self-hosted solution for complete data privacy. Your data, your server.
Organized Storage: Keep all personal data in one searchable place. Never lose information.
